entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wekweeti
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
